mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICENUM, EMPLOYEENUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, REGDATE, MODDATE,CATEGORY, HIT) VALUES (NULL, #{employeeNum}, #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), NOW(),#{category}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.EMPLOYEENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.MODDATE, N.HIT, N.CONTENTS, NF.ORINAME FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN NOTICEFILE NF ON (N.NOTICENUM=NF.NOTICENUM) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE N.NOTICENUM=#{noticeNum}
SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.EMPLOYEENUM, N.MODDATE, N.HIT FROM NOTICE N JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM)
